channel.title: Cheap NAS housing
channel.description:
http://www.amazon.com/dp/B005KKJPCO/
Thought some people might be interested, if you shop around you can get this model for around $250 USD. Quick specs: Decent little amd cpu 4 sata ports on the backplane 1 internal sata port for 5th hdd/optical (has 5.25 slot for mounting) 1 internal usb port (yes, port, not header) handy for boot with a usb stick/ssd comes with 2gb ddr3 ram (supports and a 250gb hdd No windows tax
This would build a fantastic soho NAS (even more so once hdd prices drop again)

item.title: Cheap NAS housing
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That does look like a good deal, though I can’t find any specs like you mentioned on amazon.com, maybe I’m not looking in the right place.

Anyway, I’d buy this if I didn’t have a dedicated server set up to do the same thing, the downside to my setup is the noise.

Read full topic

Amazon.com: HP 658553-001 ProLiant N40L Ultra Micro Tower Server System AMD Turion II Neo N40L 1.5GHz 2C 2GB (1 x 2GB) 1 x 250GB LFF SATA: Computers & Accessories

General Information Manufacturer: Hewlett-Packard Manufacturer Part Number: 658553-001 Manufacturer Website Address: www.hp.com Brand Name: HP Product Line: ProLiant Product Series: MicroServer Produc ...

Thought some people might be interested, if you shop around you can get this model for around $250 USD. Quick specs:
Decent little amd cpu
4 sata ports on the backplane
1 internal sata port for 5th hdd/optical (has 5.25 slot for mounting)
1 internal usb port (yes, port, not header) handy for boot with a usb stick/ssd
comes with 2gb ddr3 ram (supports and a 250gb hdd
No windows tax

This would build a fantastic soho NAS (even more so once hdd prices drop again)
